meanings.sent1: The storm will destruct the old barn.
meanings.sent2: The demolition crew will destruct the building tomorrow.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous raccoon tried to destruct the picnic by stealing all the food.
meanings.sent4: The virus began to silently destruct the computer's files.
meanings.sent5: The superhero's laser eyes could instantly destruct any obstacle in his path.

meanings.definition: The act of causing damage or harm to something
meanings.sent1: The destruct of the ancient artifact was irreversible.
meanings.sent2: The vandal's graffiti was a clear sign of destruct to the property.
meanings.sent3: The toddler's attempt at painting ended in a colorful destruct of the living room walls.
meanings.sent4: The destruct caused by the wildfire left a trail of devastation in its wake.
meanings.sent5: The earthquake's sudden destruct shocked the entire town.
